deadspin.com/2015/04/gary-bettman-bungle.snippet: During the Jets-Ducks playoff series, Winnipeg fans chanted Katy Perry at Anaheim's Corey Perry. NHL commissioner Gary Bettman was asked about it today. He did not answer the question gracefully.
